description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1ldk7","text":"Protocol to extract high quality DNA from Cowpea leaves using modified CTAB method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: Protocol for DNA Extraction from Tepary Bean

manuscript_citation: Semagn K. Leaf tissue sampling and DNA extraction protocols. Methods Mol Biol. 2014;1115:53-67. doi: 10.1007/978-1-62703-767-9_3. PMID: 24415469.
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"7cthv","text":"Buffer and Chemicals Required","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ms6h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c56q","text":"1. CTAB Buffer pH.8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77m85","text":"    CTAB- 20 g/L","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89g4e","text":"    Tris- 12.11 g/L","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag5eb","text":"    EDTA- 7.44 g/L","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fb32","text":"    NaCl - 81.89 g/L","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"estjp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d93ra","text":"2. RNAse A (10mg/ml)- Dissolve in TNE buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mn9v","text":"Tris-cl - 10mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d0k9","text":"Nacl - 15 mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ivg3","text":"EDTA - 1 mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8dkq","text":"Reconstitution as per Sigma Aldrich Roche Document (Product code: 10109142001)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i7i2","text":"         RNase A can be dissolved at a concentration of 1 to 10 mg/ml in 10 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5, 15 mM NaCl, heated to    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csvsu","text":"         100 °C for 15 minutes to inactivate contaminating DNases and cooled slowly to room temperature and dispend ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l02v","text":"         into aliquots. Roche recommends subsequent storage at -15 to -25 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nrk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47s2j","text":"3. Proteinase K (20mg/ml) : Dissolve in TE buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em61k","text":"4. Phenol:Chloroform kit - Stored at 4 °C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67o51","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96uus","text":"5. Isopropanol (room temperature)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ilh6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gll0","text":"6. 3M Sodium Acetate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jl9e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77onp","text":"7. 70 % Ethanol (Ice-cold)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biiu3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qftq","text":"8. TE Buffer pH.8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4unf","text":"Tris- 10mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvvvt","text":"EDTA- 1mM","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24rbo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5dmb","text":"9. Agarose","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bjbrq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crt5s","text":"10. Ethidium Bromide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47ric","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84i61","text":"11.Size Marker: 1 kb DNA ladder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ljnu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8cql","text":"Instrument","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4somk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vluf","text":"1. Centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcf9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dn65d","text":"2. Hot Water Bath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqs53","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5di31","text":"3. Spectrophotometer- Nanodrop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adjg4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dckar","text":"4. Gel Documentation system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f7l11","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mpl8","text":"Collect 1 fully expanded leaf from Cowpea plants in a 50ml centrifuge tube containing five sterile glass beads (5mm diameter) and freeze immediately in liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16stp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coksv","text":"Add equal volume of Chloroform, and vortex well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"viq6r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"s3dwr","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":null,"data":{}},{"key":"ah960","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lfhl","text":"Centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 15 min. Transfer the upper aqueous layer to a new 1.5 ml Ep tube (~350-400 uL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fivtg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5sept","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqhq4","text":"Do not touch below layers while transferring the aqueous phase. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7abq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"19sbq","text":"Repeat the Phenol: Chloroform alcohol step if the aqueous phase is not clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2icb6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8037D167345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":130.31272727272722,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7tc7v\",\"text\":\"Tepary sample with Phenol:Chloroform mixed with sample\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}},{\"key\":\"bqds5\",\"text\":\"Note: for cowpea we use only chloroform, but it looks the same after vortexing\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"20220729_130920.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iym7bpnfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iym6bpnfx.jpg","width":189.60846560846554}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8037D328345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":206.5272727272727,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"dvei8\",\"text\":\"Transfer upper aqueous layer to a new tube\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"20220707_163748.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iym9bpnfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iym8bpnfx.jpg","width":167.0441176470588}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gnro","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fer31","text":"Add equal volume of isopropanol, and mix very gently, keep for few minutes to precipitate nucleic acid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4itgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ke0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b15l2","text":"Note: It may take up to 30 minutes of incubation at room temperature to observe precipitate nucleic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dwim5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"wufgs","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":null,"entityRanges":null,"data":{}},{"key":"1ahge","text":"Centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 10 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mhsb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmknf","text":"Pellet can be seen at the bottom. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj4fj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85nqf","text":"Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"80397554345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":334.0000000000003,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"4kk3o\",\"text\":\"White strands noticed after adding isopropanol\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"20220707_171037.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iyndbpnfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iyncbpnfx.jpg","width":170.56638811513486}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2peke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uk7p","text":"After 30 min, remove the tubes from water bath and centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 15 min to ensure lysate is cleared.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6f5uv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0e4d","text":"Transfer cleared lysate of 500 μl to a new 1.5 ml tube. Add 10 ul of RNase (10 mg/ml) and keep at 37 °C for 30 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e03ev","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erbt4","text":"Add 300 μl of 3M Sodium Acetate and 500 μl 70 % ethanol and centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0co6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cgoro","text":"Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cussv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a69f6","text":"Add 200 μl 70 % Ethanol and centrifuge at 14000 rpm for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cef6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81rb5","text":"Discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5tum0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"areqp","text":"Air-dry the pellet, dissolve the pellet in 50 μl TE Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"562o4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51f87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8nf0","text":"Add 600 μl of pre-warmed CTAB buffer and 12 ul of proteinase K (20 mg/ml), invert the tubes gently to mix together and incubate the tubes in water bath at 65 °C for 30 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51s83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"751j3","text":"Invert the tubes once in every 10 min to homogenize the tissue and buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fl08q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gcihy","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"803FCCF4345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":250.00000000000105,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"dbt3q\",\"text\":\"CTAB buffer added to sample- clear green solution \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"20220729_115114.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iympbpnfx.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iymnbpnfx.jpg","width":187.58526603001442}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fevc2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fik7","text":"DNA is run on a 0.8% Agarose gel to check whether it is degraded or having RNA contamination. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fis1m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"do323","text":"If RNA is present, treat the samples with RNAse A and precipitate again from phenol:chloroform step 4. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f42e3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brm1p","text":"Nucleic acid concentration is measured in Nanodrop, and Ratio of A260/A230 with 1.8-2.0 indicates purity of DNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8st63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al1sv","text":"In case the values are \u003c1.8, it indicates contamination such as carbohydrate or phenol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvm4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ktwwx","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"80412FB3345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":78.19767441860465,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"6n4l4\",\"text\":\"0.8 % Agarose Gel picture\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iymmbpnfx.png","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iymkbpnfx.png","type":1,"width":100}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8s6uf","text":"Grind tissue using vortex, ensuring tissue remains frozen. Transfer ~.5 mL of ground tissue to a new 2 mL eppendorf tube containing two 2mm glass beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57m59","text":"Before beginning: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q9js","text":"Heat water bath to 65 °C and place CTAB buffer in 65 °C water bath for 20 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s16d","text":"Heat incubator to 37 °C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhj7l","text":"Place 70% ethanol in 4 °C ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44hgg","text":"Make sure RNAse (10mg/mL) is already made and treated","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fr08","text":"Make sure proteinase K (20mg/mL) is made","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5knfu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ev15","text":"*Note on CTAB buffer: Because of high phenol content in the leaf tissue, it may be helpful to add 1% PVP to the CTAB buffer  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqpo7","text":"Further beat the tissue by placing in the bead beater for 1 minute in one direction, then 1 minute in the opposite direction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8ba8","text":"Place at 4°C overnight, then measure concentration and purity on a Nanodrop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for DNA Extraction from Cowpea
